snippet: Ms. Jones’s tenure as director will end in December, with much accomplished and much that still needs to be done.
abstract: Museum of the City of New York director Susan Henshaw Jones, who has presided over 10-year renovation project, updating of exhibits and financial resuscitation of institution, will step down at end of 2015; comments that she met most of her goals as director and is leaving museum in good shape for her successor.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Jones’s tenure as director will end in December, with much accomplished and much that still needs to be done.

headline.main: Susan Henshaw Jones to Leave Museum of the City of New York
headline.print_headline: Director to Leave Museum of the City of New York

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Museum of the City of New York
